title: Documentation - Get access to dashboards
abstract:
# Documentation - Get access to dashboards
For information about setting role bindings from the GDCH console, see [Grant access to project resources](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/application/ao-user/iam/role-bindings) .
The Project IAM Admin can assign and remove the corresponding viewer role in the scope of a specified project. This role lets you view project-related logs and metrics in the org admin cluster for data observability. For more information about role assignments, see [Role definitions](/distributed-cloud/hosted/docs/latest/gdch/application/ao-user/iam/role-definitions)
